skill.name: frontend-design
skill.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with exceptional design quality. Use when building web components, pages, or applications that need creative, polished aesthetics.

skill.author: AI-Vibe-Prompts

security_audit.summary: This is a pure prompt/skill definition file containing only design guidelines, best practices, and CSS/React code examples. No executable scripts, network calls, or filesystem access capabilities detected.

content.value_statement: Generic AI-generated designs often look the same. This skill guides creation of memorable, production-grade frontend interfaces with bold aesthetic choices and exceptional visual polish.
actual_capabilities: Guide creation of distinctive frontend interfaces avoiding generic aesthetics
Apply bold intentionality in typography, color, and layout choices
Implement CSS animations, motion design, and choreographed interactions
Design unique visual systems with atmospheric backgrounds and textures
Build React components with animation libraries like Framer Motion
Follow production-grade standards for accessibility, performance, and polish
limitations: Requires user to provide project context and specific requirements
Does not generate full application architectures or backend integration
Does not automatically validate accessibility or performance metrics

use_cases.title: Create memorable web components
use_cases.description: Build web components with unique aesthetics that stand out from generic templates and frameworks

use_cases.title: Develop design-forward pages
use_cases.description: Create landing pages, marketing sites, and showcases with distinctive visual identity

use_cases.title: Build polished interfaces
use_cases.description: Develop applications with cohesive design direction and production-quality code implementation

prompt_templates.title: Hero section
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a distinctive hero section for a [product type] that avoids generic AI aesthetics like purple gradients and Inter font.

prompt_templates.title: Animated component
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a React component with staggered animations for [element type] using [animation library or CSS].

prompt_templates.title: Visual system
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a cohesive typography and color system for [brand/industry] with [aesthetic direction].

prompt_templates.title: Landing page
prompt_templates.prompt: Build a complete landing page section for [feature/purpose] with atmospheric backgrounds, motion effects, and memorable visual design.

output_examples.input: Create a distinctive hero section for a design agency portfolio
output: A React component with atmospheric gradient blob effects
Staggered title/subtitle/CTA animations using Framer Motion
Distinctive typography pairing (Syne display font with IBM Plex Sans body)
Glassmorphic surface effects and noise texture overlays

best_practices: Commit fully to a clear aesthetic direction rather than playing it safe
Choose distinctive fonts that create memorable brand identity
Prioritize high-impact motion moments over scattered micro-interactions
anti_patterns: Using generic fonts like Inter, Roboto, or system default fonts
Applying cliched color schemes like purple gradients on white backgrounds
Following predictable layouts and cookie-cutter component patterns

faq.question: What AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Claude Code, and Codex for generating frontend code and design guidance.

faq.question: What complexity levels can it handle?
faq.answer: From simple components to complex landing pages. Match code complexity to the aesthetic vision you want to achieve.

faq.question: How does it integrate with my workflow?
faq.answer: Invoke the skill when building new components or pages. Provide context about your project and design goals.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: This skill only processes design instructions. It does not access files, network, or external systems beyond generating code.

faq.question: Why do my designs look generic?
faq.answer: Generic AI designs converge on common patterns. This skill forces distinctive choices in typography, color, layout, and motion.

faq.question: How is this different from other design prompts?
faq.answer: It actively avoids cliched AI aesthetics and enforces bold, intentional design decisions with production-ready code.
